title: China accuses WHO of 'attempting to smear' Beijing in row about origins of COVID
description: China has accused the World Health Organisation (WHO) of "attempting to smear" Beijing after the global health body's boss said data linking the origins of coronavirus to raccoon dogs should have been shared years ago.

title: British sisters killed in West Bank shooting named by Benjamin Netanyahu
description: Two British sisters who died in a shooting in the West Bank have been named by Israel's prime minister.

title: WWE apologises for Auschwitz image used in preview show
description: World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) has apologised after using an image from the Nazi Holocaust camp Auschwitz during a preview show.

title: China begins military drills near Taiwan - after island's leader met with US speaker
description: China has begun three days of military exercises around Taiwan in retaliation for a meeting between the US House of Representatives speaker and the president of the self-ruled island claimed by Beijing.

title: 'We were blessed': Masters spectators describe lucky escape after three trees blown over
description: Several spectators had a lucky escape on Friday as strong winds brought three trees crashing down during the second round of the 87th Masters.

title: Three people dead in attacks across Israel and the West Bank as violence intensifies
description: Three people have died across Israel and the West Bank in terrorist attacks as violence in the region continues.
